panels.title: Habana all cards utlization by pod (avg over range)

targets.expr: avg by (instance,device) (habanalabs_memory_used_bytes{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", pod_name=~"$pod", pod_namespace=~"$namespace"} / habanalabs_memory_total_bytes{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", pod_name=~"$pod", pod_namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (instance, device) (habanalabs_power_mW{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", pod_name=~"$pod", pod_namespace=~"$namespace"} / habanalabs_power_default_limit_mW{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", pod_name=~"$pod", pod_namespace=~"$namespace"})
